snippet: On Friday, cybersecurity experts said they had evidence of the first confirmed attack on a major corporation using a bug in open source security technology.
abstract: On Friday, cybersecurity experts said they had evidence of the first confirmed attack on a major corporation using a bug in open source security technology.

headline.main: Heartbleed Internet Security Flaw Used in Attack
headline.print_headline: Hackers Use Heartbleed to Hit ‘Major Corporation’
